Posts.Content: I had real problems with tablet taxoifen and couldn't sleep.I had it change to a liquid Soltamox which is the same but without the addictives.i have no side effects since I have changed.It is expensive and you need to ask for it. Hope this helps Sam
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen, hot flushes and night sweats.

Posts.Content: Hello I have had surgery,chemo and radiation.I have been left with neuropathy on my feet and hands caused by chemo.I am still having been having herception every 3 weeks for the last 6 months.I would have thought I should feel better by now but still feeling tired all the time.I would like to exercise to build up my stamina but my feet make it difficult to walk and I have a hicks line in for the herception so can't go swimming.Has anyone else had the same problems?Do you know of any exercise or things I can do to feel better Any suggestions welcomed Thanks Sam
Posts.Title: Neuropathy on my feet and hands and exercise
